name: This Is Fine (Drapenot, David Schwab, TheChriggu, gallard)
name_original: This Is Fine (Drapenot, David Schwab, TheChriggu, gallard)
description:
A Global Game Jam 2022 project.

Fire and Water

Man and Nature

Life and Death

So many dualities out there.

And we chose to do this?

Controls:

WASD to walk.

Space to jump.

Mouse to look around.

Left Mouse Click on a water source to fill the Bucket with water.

Left Mouse Click when Bucket is full to throw the water and extinguish a burning animal.
